<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Sod Stacker]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
A. Duda and Sons, Inc. has immediate openings for Full Time hourly Sod Stackers working at our LaBelle Sod Farm location. The Sod Stacker is part of the harvesting team responsible for stacking sod. Typical work hours are Monday-Friday 6am to 4pm with some opportunities to work weekends. In addition, the Sod Stacker's duties may include the following:
  

  

  
+ Mowing and sharpening blades
  

  
+ Repairing Pallets
  

  
+ Forklift Operation
  

  
+ Tractor Driving
  

  

  
***Sod harvesting and work hours may vary due to the demand and weather conditions.
  

  
Sod Stackers are paid a piece rate per pallet in addition to their hourly wage. Tractor driving skills are preferred but not mandatory. Must be age 18 or older.
  

  
 
  

  
To apply: submit your resume or stop by in person at the LaBelle location to complete an application, Monday to Friday 8 am to 4 pm. 
  

  
A Duda & Sons
  

  
12250 S. SR 29
  

  
LaBelle, FL 33930
  

  
All applicants must be able to successfully pass a physical, drug test, and criminal background check. The individual should have a great attitude and the ability to learn new things while keeping the interest of our company a priority.  We offer an excellent benefit package as part of our total compensation including medical, dental and vision insurance, 401K, flexible spending accounts, paid time off, holiday pay and much more. 
  

  
Duda is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status.

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Equipment Operator/Tractor Driver]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
A Duda & Sons, Inc., has immediate openings for Full Time hourly Equipment Operator/Tractor Drivers for its Lake Placid FL Sod Farm location. 
  

  
The Equipment Operator/Tractor Driver may be responsible for hauling loaded pallets of sod out of the field on a forklift to the loading areas as assigned, spraying, mowing,  etc.  Ability to operate multiple pieces of farm equipment is preferred. Typical work hours are Monday - Friday 6 am to 5 pm with some opportunities to work weekends, work hours may vary due to demand and weather conditions.  In addition, the Equipment Operator/Tractor Driver's duties may include the following:
  

  

  
+ Performing general labor tasks, light mechanics
  

  
+ Conducting daily equipment inspection
  

  
+ Changing implements for cultivating, and spraying
  

  
+ Experience with GPS guided equipment or precision agriculture - a plus
  

  

  
Working Conditions:
  

  

  
+ Work is mainly outdoors in farm fields, typically over un-even terrain. 
  

  
+ Workers will be exposed to outdoor elements.
  

  

  
To apply: submit your resume or stop by in person at the Lake Placid location to complete an application, Monday to Friday 8 am to 4 pm. 
  

  
DudaSod
  

  
760 County Road 29
  

  
Lake Placid, FL 33852
  

  
All applicants must be able to successfully pass a physical, drug test, and criminal background check. The individual should have a great attitude and the ability to learn new things while keeping the interest of our company a priority.  We offer an excellent benefit package as part of our total compensation including medical, dental and vision insurance, 401K, flexible spending accounts, paid time off, holiday pay and much more. 
  

  
Duda is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status.
  

  
Powered by JazzHR

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Sod Stacker]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 A. Duda and Sons, Inc. a privately owned company, recognized as #4 on Orlando Business Journal's Top 100 Privately held companies list in Central Florida has an exciting opportunity for an hourly Sod Stacker at our Oviedo, FL location. Starting out as a humble celery farm in 1926, DUDA’s business operations today include Duda Farm Fresh Foods, one of the world’s leading producers and suppliers of celery and other quality fresh and fresh-cut vegetables and citrus; The Viera Company, a highly regarded community developer with fully-integrated real estate operations including Viera Builders, a residential home builder; as well as Duda Ranches, manager of DUDA’s agricultural operations including sod, sugarcane, citrus and cattle. 
  

  
 The Sod Stacker is part of the harvesting team responsible for stacking fresh-cut sod on pallets.  **Typical work hours are Monday - Friday 7 am to 4 pm with some opportunities to work weekends.  In addition, the Sod Stacker's duties may include the following: 
  

  

  
+  Mowing, rolling and sharpening blades 
  

  
+  Repairing pallets 
  

  
+  Forklift Operation 
  

  
+  Tractor driving 
  

  
+  General upkeep of the shop area 
  

  

  
 **Sod harvesting and work hours may vary due to demand and weather conditions. 
  

  
 Sod Stackers are paid a $1 piece rate per pallet in addition to their hourly wage.  Tractor driving skills are preferred but not mandatory.  Must be age 18 or older.  
  

  
 Please apply online or in person at 1205 Duda Trail, Oviedo, FL 32765 
  

  
 We offer an excellent benefits package as part of our total compensation including medical, dental and vision insurance, 401K, flexible spending accounts, tuition reimbursement program and much more.  Visit our website, www.duda.com for more information.   
  

  
 Duda is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. 
  

  
Powered by JazzHR

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Truck Driver- Class A, Sod - Local Deliveries]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
We are looking for a Truck Driver to operate a semi-flatbed truck with a piggyback forklift to load and unload sod onto the truck and deliver the sod to various locations within a 75-mile radius. This position reports to the Sod Farm Manager. We offer excellent benefits as part of our total compensation including medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401K, holiday pay, vacation, sick pay, and much more. 
  

  
A. Duda and Sons, Inc. a privately owned family company, recognized as #4 on Orlando Business Journal's Top 100 Privately held companies list in Central Florida has an immediate need for a Commercial Truck Driver located at our sod farm in Oviedo, FL. Starting as a humble celery farm in 1926, DUDA’s business operations today include Duda Farm Fresh Foods, one of the world’s leading producers and suppliers of celery and other quality fresh and fresh-cut vegetables and citrus; The Viera Company, a highly regarded community developer with fully-integrated real estate operations including Viera Builders, a residential home builder; as well as Duda Ranches, manager of DUDA’s agricultural operations including sod, sugarcane, citrus, and cattle.
  

  
The Truck Driver's duties will also include the following:
  

  

  
+ Operate a forklift to safely load and unload pallets of sod
  

  
+ Keep a daily log of the truck's health.
  

  
+ Routinely check the truck tires for wear and make sure tires have enough air pressure, front and rear l
